Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. With its exceptional quality and functionality, it's truly a valuable asset. I believe it would greatly benefit you and enhance your daily activities. Considering its worth to me, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $95. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it offers you a significant savings of $25 compared to my usual selling price. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
